snippet.title: 22 Videogames/Systems We Aim to Play
snippet.description: Next-gen hardware (Xbox One, PlayStation 4), new editions of old favorites (''Call of Duty,'' ''Splinter Cell''), fresh IPs (''Watch Dogs,'' ''Tearaway''), more that we're excited for this season

snippet.title: Videogames: 12 We Can't Wait to Play This Winter
snippet.description: ''Dead Space 3'' arrives today; here are 11 more releases we're excited about between now and April
